angle_follow.AngleFollow.explanation: Set the angle of the drone relative to a moving subject's velocity.
angle_follow.AngleFollow.hint: Set the relative position of the drone

horizon.Horizon.explanation: Force the camera to point at the horizon, instead of trying to keep the subject vertically centered.

joysticks.Joysticks.explanation: Control the vehicle with dual joysticks

party_mode.PartyMode.explanation: Look for people to follow for 15 seconds each.
party_mode.PartyMode.hint: Follow for people at a party

polygon_path.PolygonPath.explanation:
Fly in the shape of a polygon defined by adjustable settings:

Number of sides
Radius
Direction
polygon_path.PolygonPath.hint: Fly in the shape of a polygon

property_tour.PropertyTour.explanation: Create a tour of your house, automatically

security_bot.SecurityBot.hint: Detect and follow people around a defined region
